host.description: Name of the host machine the server is running from

port.description: Port to be used for listening to incoming connections

url.description: URL the server can be accessed from

trustProxy.description: Whether to trust the client's x-Forwarded-For header for the request IP address. Only enable if using your own trusted reverse proxy

debugRequestTime.description: Will log the execution time of each request

logStackOnError.description: Will log a stack trace when an error occurs
